top_stories.title: Amazon launches $68 million AI PhD Fellowship program
top_stories.description: Initiative will fund over 100 doctoral students researching machine learning, computer vision, and natural-language processing at nine universities.
top_stories.author: Staff writer
top_stories.content: Initiative will fund over 100 doctoral students researching machine learning, computer vision, and natural-language processing at nine universities.

top_stories.title: Scala development in Amazon SageMaker Studio with Almond kernel
top_stories.description: This post provides a comprehensive guide on integrating the Almond kernel into SageMaker Studio, offering a solution for Scala development within the platform.
top_stories.author: Varun Rajan
top_stories.content: This post provides a comprehensive guide on integrating the Almond kernel into SageMaker Studio, offering a solution for Scala development within the platform.

top_stories.title: Building smarter AI agents: AgentCore long-term memory deep dive
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory transforms raw conversational data into persistent, actionable knowledge through sophisticated extraction, consolidation, and retrieval mechanisms that mirror human cognitive processes. The system tackles the complex challenge of building AI agents that don't just store conversations but extract meaningful insights, merge related information across time, and maintain coherent memory stores that enable truly context-aware interactions.
top_stories.author: Akarsha Sehwag
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how Amazon Bedrock AgentCore Memory transforms raw conversational data into persistent, actionable knowledge through sophisticated extraction, consolidation, and retrieval mechanisms that mirror human cognitive processes. The system tackles the complex challenge of building AI agents that don't just store conversations but extract meaningful insights, merge related information across time, and maintain coherent memory stores that enable truly context-aware interactions.

top_stories.title: How Amazon Bedrock Custom Model Import streamlined LLM deployment for Salesforce
top_stories.description: This post shows how Salesforce integrated Amazon Bedrock Custom Model Import into their machine learning operations (MLOps) workflow, reused existing endpoints without application changes, and benchmarked scalability. We share key metrics on operational efficiency and cost optimization gains, and offer practical insights for simplifying your deployment strategy.
top_stories.author: Srikanta Prasad, Utkarsh Arora, Raghav Tanaji, Nitin Surya, Gokulakrishnan Gopalakrishnan, Akhilesh Deepak Gotmare,
top_stories.content: This post shows how Salesforce integrated Amazon Bedrock Custom Model Import into their machine learning operations (MLOps) workflow, reused existing endpoints without application changes, and benchmarked scalability. We share key metrics on operational efficiency and cost optimization gains, and offer practical insights for simplifying your deployment strategy.

top_stories.title: Microsoft Azure delivers the first large scale cluster with NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 for OpenAI workloads
top_stories.description: Microsoft delivers the first at-scale production cluster with more than 4,600 NVIDIA GB300 NVL72, featuring NVIDIA Blackwell Ultra GPUs connected through the next-generation NVIDIA InfiniBand network. The post Microsoft Azure delivers the first large scale cluster with NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 for OpenAI workloads appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog.
top_stories.author: Rani Borkar and Nidhi Chappell
top_stories.content: Microsoft delivers the first at-scale production cluster with more than 4,600 NVIDIA GB300 NVL72, featuring NVIDIA Blackwell Ultra GPUs connected through the next-generation NVIDIA InfiniBand network. The post Microsoft Azure delivers the first large scale cluster with NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 for OpenAI workloads appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog.
